name: Dead Man's Hand Pinball
description:
This is a wild west themed pinball game, made in Unity as a part of gamedev education course in Pismo - Gamedev incubator in Novska, Croatia. It is completely made by students of Unity and Blender courses. 

The project is far from complete, it's work in progress, presented as-is, further development is possible but unlikely.

Team members:

Tomislav Klepac, Zlatko Margeta, Marko Vrebac, Saša Rajković, Vanja Popović, Marin Galić

Music used under Creative Commons Atribution license:

1. Musée Mécanique recording project - 3 Old Marvel Player Pianohttps://freesound.org/people/RTB45/sounds/368760/

2. https://freesound.org/people/Razzvio/sounds/79572/

2D art designed by freepik.com
